title: Interpretation of a dream about a blue bird according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing a blue bird in a dream means luck, wealth, and other interpretations. We will explain it for a single woman, married, pregnant, divorced, or a man, such as holding a blue bird in his hand, dreaming of a blue bird, buying a blue bird, a blue bird flying in the house, or a dead blue bird in Ibn Sirin, and much more in the topic appendix.  Interpretation of a blue bird in a dream Seeing a blue bird in a dream is a sign of the beautiful wealth that will come to the dreamer. And for the one who saw this vision, it will be a lucky and blessed year free from all his worries. Seeing a blue bird in a dream is also interpreted as getting rid of all difficulties, moral and financial, and evidence of the beautiful events that will come upon the person's head and can mean marriage for the unmarried in general. It also means righteous offspring for those who want to have a child, and this vision shows both the blessings of the world and God's pleasure with you. Seeing a blue bird flying in a dream This means the good news that the dreamer will receive soon, and the person who sees this vision will reach the good news that he has been waiting for for a long time. And if the flying blue bird falls in a dream, it means that you will go through a very beautiful and good situation and you will be able to find solutions to all your current problems soon, and this vision sometimes shows a change in the situation, which may include the workplace or place of residence, buying or selling a house, or the like. Seeing a blue bird also indicates a new job interview, and also indicates success and profit soon.  Seeing a blue bird in a dream means that the dreamer will go on a trip related to academic life and therefore will experience separation for a while with the person he loves and each of them will be deeply saddened, but after returning from his trip, he will be happy, and the longing that tormented him greatly will disappear. At the same time, it suggests that the dreamer will get rid of the problems he has been living with for a long time and overcome his problems, God willing, with the help of a close person or lover. Seeing a sick blue bird in a dream means that the person who sees the dream must be separated from the person he loves despite the fact that he is going through a very beautiful period in his professional life, for this reason he will live with a wonderful life. And he may regret and spend the rest of his life alone. Interpretation of a blue bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin Basically, blue birds in a dream are a symbol of freedom in many places and many things, such as freedom of work or freedom of choice of spouse, etc.  Seeing a blue bird flapping in a room or in a cage in a dream means that you are looking for a way out of a confused mental state. A dream with a beautiful blue bird indicates that your life from the outside looks beautiful and ideal, but in reality you are facing psychological problems and problems that you have not told anyone about. Anyone who sees blue birds in your dream means that you should not always take them seriously, maybe you should turn a blind eye to some words that you will hear from people and will not like them. The blue bird in the cage in the dream may indicate restrictions and lack of freedom, living in illusion and being exposed to obstacles. An empty cage or a cage with a dead blue bird in a dream expresses his disappointment. Because the blue bird outside the cage actually shows more freedom, but seeing the blue bird imprisoned in the cage means that he feels very restricted. The dream of a blue bird indicates breaking boundaries and restrictions, and whoever dreams of it means that he will fight for integrity and fight to defend ideas that by their nature need freedom to achieve them. Seeing a flock of blue birds flying erratically indicates material confusion and mismanagement of money, and may indicate that the dreamer will stop acting according to his opinion in exchange for acting according to whims and spiritual desire. Whoever dreams of a blue bird with golden wings indicates longing, and the bird that soars high in the air indicates awareness, civilization, and the person who seeks knowledge. The small blue bird in a dream shows the ability to develop your own projects and suggests that you continue to pursue freedom as shown in his vision A baby blue bird in a dream  You need to make plans or preparations to overcome the obstacles you will face soon and move towards greater independence. Blue birds also express people's need to present their opinions to others. Seeing a blue bird's nest in a dream  Indicates something, a subject, a project, or a person, unfortunately, that is unreachable for people and an area that you cannot access, so you need to make your aspirations and goals realistic and things that you can access, not unreasonable things or impossible things. Seeing a blue owl in a dream can symbolize hidden wisdom and the blue raven in the dream represents darkness, sadness, and a sign of bad luck. Interpretation of catching a blue bird in a dream Seeing a dream of catching a blue bird  shows that the person who saw the dream will face beautiful events related to professional life, but he will face great psychological pressures and sorrows and will quickly pass through this stage and receive important news to do very good deeds soon, and based on this news, he will make very large profits and have a happy and safe marital nest. Interpretation of catching a blue bird in a dream Seeing catching a blue bird in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of his worries soon and the pessimism that he has been living with for a long time in professional life will soon collapse and he will participate in a profitable work with a relative or with a friend or wife, and he will sign very successful and large projects, and he will get very large profits and gain experience in work that will raise him forward and he will be appointed to good positions in the highest ranks. Interpretation of feeding a blue bird in a dream Seeing feeding a blue bird in a dream  expresses that the person who sees the dream will have very bad days in professional life, but despite this situation, he will provide support to people close to him and who care about him, for this reason he will receive blessings and these people will do so. He will help him when he sees very bad days and a very strong bond will appear between him and those around him. Interpretation of a dead blue bird in a dream Seeing a dead blue bird in a dream means disappointment and dissatisfaction, but it also shows bitterness for a person who suddenly stopped depending on us. Also, seeing the death of the blue bird in a dream ...

Chocolate is a popular treat around the world, and its presence in dreams can be both delightful and perplexing. Dream interpretations offer insight into the symbolism behind chocolate in dreams, providing potential explanations for its appearance and its connection to our waking lives.

Dreams of losing chocolate can evoke feelings of anxiety and a desire for understanding. While these dreams may seem insignificant, they can offer a glimpse into our subconscious thoughts and emotions. The following interpretations are based on the insights of knowledgeable dream interpreters, not personal opinions:

**Losing Chocolate:** Losing or having chocolate stolen in a dream might suggest upcoming changes in your life. This could indicate potential challenges or unexpected events on the horizon.

**Seeing Chocolate Disappear:** Witnessing the loss of chocolate in a dream might symbolize sadness or difficulties that you may experience in the near future.

**Stealing Chocolate:** If you dream of stealing chocolate, it could represent a potential financial loss you might face. This serves as a reminder to seek guidance and support during such times.

**Chocolate Lost or Stolen:** The loss or theft of chocolate in a dream could also signify misfortune or emotional distress you may encounter.

**Distributing Chocolate:** Distributing chocolate in your dreams can suggest a prosperous and joyful period in your life. This dream might also foreshadow positive changes and a smoother path ahead.

**Giving Away Chocolate:** Sharing chocolate with others in a dream can symbolize a transformation for the better, bringing more ease and comfort into your life. It could indicate the fulfillment of aspirations and the attainment of dreams through divine grace.

**Coconut Chocolate:** Encountering coconut chocolate in a dream signifies joy and happiness that are likely to enter your life. This dream can also indicate success and prosperity in your endeavors.

**Eating Coconut Chocolate:** If you dream of consuming coconut chocolate, it might signify the end of worries and sorrows, paving the way for a brighter and more peaceful future.

**Receiving Chocolate from a Deceased Person:** Dreams where a deceased individual offers you chocolate could signify good news and blessings coming your way. It could also represent a need for prayer and charitable acts on behalf of the deceased.

**Requesting Chocolate from a Deceased Person:** Dreaming of a deceased person asking for chocolate suggests potential changes in your life. It could also indicate a need to offer charity and prayers for the deceased.

**Giving Chocolate to a Deceased Person:** Giving chocolate to someone who has passed away in your dream can represent good fortune and abundant blessings in your life.

**Hot Chocolate:** Drinking hot chocolate in a dream might symbolize challenges or difficulties you are facing in your life.

**Eating Hot Chocolate:** Consuming hot chocolate in a dream could indicate potential misfortunes or obstacles that may arise. It may also point to adversaries working against you, urging you to seek divine guidance and protection.

**Dark Chocolate:** Dark chocolate in a dream could signify freedom from financial burdens or health issues you may be experiencing.

**Baking Chocolate Cake:** Baking a chocolate cake in your dream suggests a balanced personality and the ability to overcome challenges. It indicates resilience and strength in facing adversity.

**Making Chocolate:** Creating chocolate in a dream signifies happiness and joy that will soon enter your life. It could also represent good news and positive changes on the horizon.

**Chocolate on the Body:** The presence of chocolate on your body in a dream suggests blessings and good fortune entering your life. It indicates prosperity and abundance.

**Eating Chocolate Candy:** Dreaming of eating chocolate candy signifies your pursuit of achieving your desires and aspirations. This dream encourages you to persevere in your efforts.

Seeing berries means money and wealth, and other meanings. We mention it for the unmarried girl, the married woman, and the pregnant woman , the divorced woman, and the man, like dreaming of red berries, or picking white berries, and eating berries black, or eating berries wild, according to Ibn Sirin and the Imam. The truthful and more continuing the topic:

Interpretation of berries in a dream

Interpreters unanimously agree that berries in a dream refer to the lawful profits and gains that the dreamer will acquire.
And whoever saw berries in his dream, this indicates the presence of offspring or a newborn in the house of the dreamer or a person from the family.

title: Ibn Sirin's Interpretation of Dreaming About Sea Shells

preview.text: Seeing mussels in a dream indicates concern for someone, and other interpretations. We will explain it for the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, such as seeing mussels and seafood for Ibn Sirin and more in the continuation of the topic: Mussels are a type of shellfish found in the sea and on the seafood restaurant menu. The interpretation of mussels in a dream: Seeing mussels in a dream indicates attention to some people in your environment, and if the mussels in the dream are clean or pure, then this indicates tensions and quarrels in the family environment. Seeing cooked mussels in a dream is a good omen, while eating mussels in a dream is not good. Opening mussels in a dream means that you will achieve success that will come through the bad behavior of others. Catching mussels in a dream symbolizes health, and as for buying mussels, big expenses await you. Seeing mussels in a dream means that the dreamer will deeply regret the action he has taken, and it may cause some losses to others and damage some valuable things. Seeing mussels in a dream means that you are acting wisely to prevent harm, and this vision means that the visionary will receive praise from some people. Anyone who sees a dream about mussels means that he will start (without thinking) a business project or enter a business, but this project or work will be completely unsuccessful and will hurt him from the beginning. This vision also means that the dreamer will start to make great efforts to get out of this situation safely. Seeing mussels in a dream indicates the difficult and harsh situation that the dreamer will face due to unexpected problems. It indicates that the matter has turned into a crisis and a major disagreement between the visionary and someone in the house, and it also indicates that things will become more confusing than you expected and you will make every effort to find solutions for it. The interpretation of mussels in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A dream about mussels is usually a very good omen, and mussels symbolize strength, peace, fertility, and profitable seasons. But be careful when thinking about your dream, as mussels can be a sign of loss, betrayal, and heartbreak. Positive changes in your life will be in full swing if you open the mussels and they are full and fresh from the inside. If you were given mussels from someone and they were full or contained a pearl, then this indicates the arrival of happiness and finding the right partner who has all the qualities you want. But if you saw that someone bought mussels and gave them to you, it means that someone who wronged you in the past will come to apologize and ask you to reconcile. If you eat mussels in a dream, it means that you are entering a period of joy and prosperity, and if you eat mussels in the presence of your partner, this may be a sign that you will have many children. If you enjoy eating mussels with friends or other loved ones, this is a sign of joy and happiness, and it may mean that someone close to you will be stubborn or determined to cause problems with you or cause a situation that worries you. Finding mussels in your dream in this case symbolizes happy or peaceful times. If someone gave you mussels, then this happiness and peace will be somehow related to the person who gave you the mussels. If this person gave you a gift or took you out for mussels, it means that he appreciates you and enjoys your presence in his life. This means that this person holds you in high esteem and will do everything in his power to make you feel happy, safe, and loved. But if you find an empty mussel shell in a dream, it may mean that you will lose something very important to you. But if you open the mussels and find them empty inside, it means that you will lose, or that you have recently suffered a loss in your life. If you go out to eat mussels with a group of people and one of the mussels on your plate is empty, this may be a sign that someone close to you has betrayed you, or will hurt or betray you in the future. Mussels in a dream can indicate damage, as surfers were injured by a mussel shell. Being injured by a mussel shell and feeling pain in a dream, especially if there is blood, is a sign of the need for treatment. Because it is likely that there will be many problems in your life in the future, and dreams of injury by a mussel shell often indicate the need for emotional healing. In short, mussels in a dream can indicate a happy and joyful time in your life, achieving success and upcoming prosperity, and the need for emotional healing. The interpretation of eating mussels in a dream: Eating mussels in a dream represents the loss of good, incompleteness, and ingratitude. It indicates the presence of someone around the dreamer who is trying to cause harm. Eating mussels in a dream indicates an inappropriate person who will forget all the help you have given him and will not care about the sacrifices you have made for him. And you may see that this person is making sacrifices without thinking for someone else and not for you. For this reason, almost all love and respect will be destroyed in the eyes of the visionary, and the dreamer will feel regret for his appreciation and love for this person. The interpretation of collecting mussels in a dream: Collecting mussels in a dream indicates the excessive happiness that you will live in the dreamer's life and the poverty that the dreamer suffers from will end, his wealth will flourish and his longing for those he loves will end because he will meet them soon. The interpretation of stuffed mussels in a dream: The person who dreams of stuffed mussels in a dream, this vision means that the dreamer will not face any hardship in life, and his family will not fall into poverty, and money will never run out and he will be deprived of blessings. It also indicates that the visionary will not diminish the livelihood of his family even in the worst of circumstances, and it also means that he will not be able to prevent them from the most luxurious and delicious temptations. The interpretation of extracting mussels in a dream: Seeing the extraction of mussels in a dream expresses that the dreamer will find again the energy to live that he has lost, and he will leave behind the days he spent in sadness and disappointment, and it also means starting life anew for the dreamer. YouTube interpretation of mussels in dreams"

title: Interpretation of a dream about killing one's mother according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing a dead mother in a dream means bad relationships, tension, and suffering losses, among other interpretations. We will explain this for single, married, pregnant, divorced, and male people, as well as the death of a murdered mother, or a mother killed by bullets or knives. Or the dream of a brother or sister killing their mother, or the injury of the mother, or the beating of the mother by Ibn Sirin, and more in the article below: The interpretation of killing the mother in a dream. 
Seeing the mother killed in a dream indicates the destruction of his life with trivial goals, and no matter how hard he tries to focus and return to the fight, he will not be able to compensate for his lack of life, and he will always find many mistakes in the work he does. 
The dream of killing the mother also shows the tense relationships between the relatives and the person's family, and this will be a reason for their annoyance. 
Killing his mother in a dream represents the friendship of the wicked and insistence on marrying an unsuitable person, and this will therefore contribute to the lack of peace in this house, in addition to the person's failure to achieve what he desires. 
The person who kills his mother in a dream shows his insistence on error and his inability to repair the relationship between him and his family, and because he does not listen to words, he will remain in a constant predicament. This nature will cause ethical problems as well as financial ones. 
The dream of killing the mother also indicates that the dreamer is a nervous person and should leave this impression, and know that stubbornness and arguments will not be of any use. 
It also expresses that the person has committed many mistakes in the past.
The dream of killing the mother is a message of elegance, beauty, obedience, wisdom, knowledge, and great good, wealth, and money. 
Seeing the mother murdered means that you have a clear and smooth path ahead of you, and this dream indicates a kind environment and happy friendships, and a sign that you have realized your full potential. 
Killing your mother in your dream is a sign that you are struggling with your career or relationship or any other problem where you need to be more independent and responsible. 
Anyone who sees their mother killed in a dream means that you are avoiding some problems, and the dream is a message that you will feel confused about some issues, and the dream also tells you that you should stop living in the past and look to the future. 
Killing the mother in the dream of an unmarried woman means that she has some concerns about beauty and femininity, the dream tells you that you need to be more connected to your femininity because fate is literally in your hands now, and anyone can propose marriage or ask you to be connected to you, and this dream indicates a transitional stage of self-exploration and proving that you need to make room for yourself.
Killing the mother in a dream revolves around your repressed instincts and your need to defend yourself and assert your opinion, but the dream tells you that there are some secrets that will be revealed soon. 
The dream of killing the mother means that you are showing some negligence in your emotional behavior, so you should take more care of your lover and give him more time and attention, because the opposite may make the lover leave you and become alone. 
The dream of killing the mother revolves around your decisions to leave or distance yourself from some situations and prove that you lack the right life partner for you. 
Dreaming of killing your mother indicates your obsession with a certain personality and is a sign that you need to express your feelings clearly to others. 
Dreaming of killing your mother is a warning to you that you should continue to move forward even when others try to obstruct you or tell you that you cannot do it. 
The dream is a sign that you will experience clarity in certain situations or relationships, and your dream means safety, love, comfort, support, and unconditional love that you will receive from your loved ones. 
Seeing your mother being killed indicates insecurity and emotional instability. 
The dream also tells you that you are drowning in a problem or issue, and it is a sign that you are raising others with your positive attitude and joyful behavior. 
This dream shows your desires to manage things more smoothly, and the dream of killing the mother is good news that you will overcome your obstacles and find a solution to the conflict. 
The dream of killing the mother is a hint to the desire to reveal more of yourself, and the dream also tells you that it is time to grow and expand into projects. 
This dream expresses your firmness and your ability to bring happiness to others, and the vision is a proof of your ability to move from one situation to another with great confidence. 
Sometimes the dream of killing your mother expresses the presence of an evil and harsh force in your life.
Seeing a dead mother in a dream means that you are not taking responsibility or moving forward to solve the problems that are bothering you in your life, and you may be trying to convince someone to stand by you or support your point of view. 
The dream is a harbinger of undeclared enmity from someone close to you, which can erupt at any time and contain a lot of violence if it is not acted upon.
The interpretation of beating the mother in a dream.
Seeing a mother being beaten in a dream from an Islamic perspective does not indicate kindness, and it expresses the regret that the person will feel throughout his life. 
Beating his mother in a dream also indicates the rebellion of man against the elders of his family, and speaking without thinking leads to wounds in the souls of those around him, and therefore commits many sins. 
Also, anyone who sees himself beating his mother in a dream means that he does not realize the amount of sacrifices others make for him, because he behaves selfishly and therefore will annoy his mother and father. 
The dream of beating the mother is a warning to man to withdraw from this path, otherwise, if he continues to hurt others with bad words, and if he does not pay attention to what he says, and stops committing sins, then he will not succeed in all his life, and his value and respect in front of others will diminish.
Seeing the person's mother being beaten in a dream indicates some words that the person was hiding inside himself and did not reveal them to his mother, so if the person's mother died, then the person would suffer some losses, but if she was alive, then the dream expresses the person's suffering to reach his mother.
The interpretation of the mother's injury in a dream.
Seeing the mother injured in a dream shows a broken heart in reality and an indication that the dreamer will cause pain to those he loves, and as a result of the person's nervousness and anger, he will quickly say some bad words to his family and parents that he will break their hearts and lose his position in the eyes of others.

title: "Dream Interpretation of a Lion in a Dream: Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and Fahd al-Assimy."

preview.text: Seeing a lion in a dream can mean danger, illness, and other interpretations. We will explain it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as a dream of a lion attacking me, or seeing a small lion escaping or a tame and peaceful lion, or seeing a lion in the house. For the great dream interpreters Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and Fahd Al-Asimi and others, in detail in the appendix to the article: The Interpretation of the Lion in a Dream by Fahd Al-Asimi. Seeing a lion in a dream, like other symbols, can have multiple meanings depending on the time and circumstances of the dreamer. Among the most important things that are said about it are the following: Lions in a dream can mean, in seeing them, staying away from the remembrance of God, abandoning the work of the teachings of religion, and reflecting on the verse: As if they are red-hot, fleeing from the palaces, and the sura is a lion, as Abu Hurayrah and others have interpreted it. Seeing lions can indicate a dangerous journey, especially for travelers, and can mean that there are bad deals from customs, for example, or at the borders from which the traveler will leave, because the lion in nature plays roles similar to these roles. Seeing a lion in a dream means that the dreamer may face a serious and fatal illness or fever, and it is known that lions do not leave them with fever, which is scientifically proven, but also because of the origin of evil from the word "asad" (lion) and its plural "asud" (lions). The saying of the Prophet, peace be upon him, supports this: From Aslam, the freedman of Umar: When Noah entered the ark, two from each pair said: How do we be sure, or how can the animals be sure that the lion is with us? So God gave him fever, and it was the first fever that came down to the earth. Narrated by Ibn Kathir. The meaning of seeing a lion in a dream can also be a sign of a journey that changes the color of one's skin to brown. This is due to the possibility of being extracted and exhausted, so blackness and the lion, individually and collectively, have similarities in wording. The dream of the lion can have among its meanings accompanying those who are not skilled, those with hard hearts and those with wild tempers, due to the link between the fierceness of the lion and its nature and its nature in reaching the vision. The presence of a lion in your dream may indicate the presence of a contagious disease or epidemic that needs to be warned and cared for, and to look at the following hadith narrated by Al-Bukhari in his Sahih from the authority of Abu Hurayrah, may God be pleased with him, saying: The Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, said: Do not touch a contagious disease, nor a bird, nor a pest, nor a yellow fever, run away from the leper as you run away from the lion. Seeing a lion can indicate harsh words and a sharp tongue, look at the hadith below to understand the connection between this meaning and this symbol. And it was narrated that the Prophet, peace be upon him, was angry with Quraysh and ordered that they be satirized. “It is more difficult for them than to be beaten by the nobles. So he sent Ibn Ruwah, and he said: Scare them. And he scared them, but they were not satisfied. So he sent Ka’b ibn Malik. Then he sent Hasan ibn Thabit. And when he came to him, Hasan said: The time has come to send this lion whose tail is lashed. Then he put out his tongue and moved it. He said: Who sent you with the truth! For the skin, show them barren of balsam. The Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, said: Do not hurry. Abu Bakr is the most knowledgeable of Quraysh about their ancestry. And about their forefathers. So, to summarize it for you. Hasan missed it. Then he turned and said: O Messenger of Allah! Your lineage has been summarized for me. He is the one who sent you with the truth! I will bring you out of them like a hair from dough. Aisha said: I heard the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, say to Hasan: The Holy Spirit supports you as long as you are calling upon God and his Messenger. He said: I heard the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, say: Hasan has calmed them down, so he is healed and healed. Hasan said: I satirized Muhammad, and I answered him, and by God in this reward. I satirized Muhammad the just Messenger of Allah, his faith, his father, and my honor with the honor of Muhammad. I protect you. My daughter, I am sorry if you do not see her stirring the dates with her hand like a sickly one. Comparing the tinkling with the elevator, on their shoulders the thirsty donkey. Our arrows rain down continuously, and they are filled with wine by the women. If we had been away from them, we would have performed the Umrah, and it was the opening and the cover. Otherwise, be patient with the strike of the day on which God will honor whom he pleases. And God said: I have sent a servant who speaks the truth without concealment. And God said: An army made easy for you is the Ansar, I have shown them to you for a meeting. Every day, we have insults or quarrels or satire. So, whoever mocks you, the Messenger of Allah, his praise and support him. Gabriel, the Messenger of Allah, is among us, and the Holy Spirit is unparalleled. On the Prophet, peace be upon him, he said: You are healed, O Hasan, and you are healed. A lion in a dream can refer to a harmful and corrupt animal, especially if it is seen by the owners of farms or farmers. And it has been proven with authenticity from Abu Hurayrah that the lion is the poisonous dog. Narrated by Imam Ibn Hazm - as in Al-Mahalla - the page or number: 7/241, so in his view, there is a harmful or harmful animal to humans. This saying is supported by what the Prophet, peace be upon him, narrated that he was asked about the poisonous dog, and he said: It is the lion. One of the meanings of seeing it is also the existence of laxity in looking at the forbidden for the dreamer or whoever enters his house, and this has been proven in the hadith of Abu Hurayrah, may God be pleased with him: Beware of looking at forbidden things, beware of the lion, and it has been narrated reliably, and this meaning is one of the meanings that I find most applicable to seeing the lion at this time, especially for women. It is also one of the meanings of seeing it the emergence of some wonderful signs or excellent worldly fortune, and reflect on what Abu Hurayrah, may God be pleased with him, narrated with a good chain of narrators on the authority of the Prophet, peace be upon him. And God bless him and grant him peace. He said: The son of Mary will descend as a righteous leader and a righteous judge, and they will break the cross and kill the pig, and they will return peace and they will take swords as knives, and they will demolish every block. Their food will descend from heaven, and their blessing will rise from the earth, until the boy plays with the snake and it does not harm him, and he will graze sheep and the wolf and it will not harm them, and he will graze the lion and the cows and it will not harm them. Look also at what Abu Hurayrah, may God be pleased with him, narrated: Blessed is the life after the Messiah, and blessed is the life after the Messiah, the sky is called for rain, and the earth is called to sprout, so if you plant your love in the earth, it will grow, and it does not envy or hate. Or hated, until the man passes by the lion and it does not harm him, and he tramples the snake and it does not harm him, he does not argue, he does not envy or hate. Al-Albani - source: The Correct Chain - page or number: 1926: Its chain is correct. Among the meanings that I prefer in this symbol, the existence of a service given to the vision from an influential person, such as princes and ministers, for example. And the word “lion” can be compared to our saying: “A lion does a favor.” Think about it to discover the connection between what I said and what I concluded. It also has good meanings, especially when seen in winter: improving the viewer's health and the disappearance of symptoms of diseases that afflict people, especially in winter, such as influenza, for example. In addition to that, one of its meanings is the presence of an enemy who is controlled by everyone according to his situation, especially for the oppressed, so beware of seeing the lion in a dream, for it may be behind him. It is a call to the oppressed.

title: Dream Interpretation of Holding a Friend's Hand in a Dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.text: To see yourself holding a friend's hand in a dream indicates your desire for friendship and your desire for a relationship, and other interpretations we will explain for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a divorced woman, as well as how you held your friend's hand, or how your friend held your hand and left it, or how your friend held your hand according to Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream If you dream of holding a friend's hand, this dream may reveal some of your fears about this person, meaning that this dream may reveal your fears of distancing yourself from that person or that person distancing themselves from you, and you may fear for your friendship. And its future. In some cases, this dream symbolizes your loneliness and feelings of isolation from others, as well as your desire for intimacy or bonding with your friends. The dream of holding your friend's hand reflects your fear of losing those close to you and that you fear that your loved ones will one day separate from you and you fear that you will be alone and isolated in life as you fear. Rejection in life drives you to close yourself in a bubble where you try not to maintain a safe emotional connection with others, but you still want to keep them close. To see yourself holding the hand of a friend with whom you are fighting in a dream means that you will reconcile with him in the future and some events or situations will lead you to solve the problems between you and abandon the disputes or problems you have with each other, problems will be solved between you and you may be friends with each other in the end after leaving all hatred and you will feel less weight after removing all toxic feelings from your mind. Holding a friend's hand is a sign of the continued love between you and him, a sign of intimacy and lasting love and love to share most things with this friend. And if you are a woman and you are clinging to a friend in your dream, you may be grateful for the existence of this person in your life because he is one of those rare friends who supports you no matter what and keeps your relationship good. With him and strengthen your relationship with him. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing someone holding a friend's hand in a dream Whoever holds his friend's hand in a dream will see material and moral support from those they love and will overcome their difficult days thanks to them. In addition, the dreamer will advance in his knowledge and experience in the situations of the case as if he were a government official and it indicates that these circumstances he is going through will make him many supporters. And look at the single girl A friend holding the brother's hand in her dream This indicates the strong friendship between the mother and her friend. Holding a friend's hand in general indicates help and support, or that you will provide help to others. Regarding the dream of holding a friend's cut hand And this is a sign of the death of the sister or friend. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream To dream that you are holding the hand of your current girlfriend is a romantic dream that suggests that there may be a strong emotional attraction. While commitment isn't always necessary, this dream may suggest that you will share a compassionate level with this partner and fulfill all the promises you made. You did it with this person. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream for a man If a man sees himself holding his friend's hand in a dream, this indicates the strength of his relationship with this friend and a sign of the improvement in the dreamer's financial situation and overcoming all his problems. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a friend holding a friend's hand in a pregnant woman's dream indicates a smooth course of pregnancy and a sign of the imminent birth of the fetus. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees herself holding her friend's hand in a dream, this indicates the end of problems, overcoming crises and living a happy life. Interpretation of holding a friend's hand in a dream for a single woman Putting a friend's hand in a single girl's dream indicates her desire for communication and experiencing love, and the vision indicates that she will succeed in her relationships. And holding a friend's hand in a single dream indicates a comfortable life and that she does not face any problems in her life. Interpretation of holding hands in a dream Holding a hand in a dream has praiseworthy meanings and indicates the desire not to be alone by starting a new relationship, whether it is a romantic relationship or a friendship relationship. Shaking someone's hand in a dream is a sign of good luck and proof that you are living happily and positively. Seeing ourselves holding hands in a dream is a sign that you may be facing some problems and need to seek help from those close to you. Whoever sees that he is holding someone's hand in his dream means that he should not refuse the help that others may offer him. Holding a lover's hand in a dream may indicate a loss of money and falling into financial problems. To dream that you are holding your own hand means that you are a sensitive person and have great affection and a feeling that you are loved by others. Anyone who sees himself holding someone's hand in a dream, the dream reflects your desire to feel protected and safe by surrounding yourself with people you trust and rely on completely. The dream in which you hold someone's hand indicates your desire to have a friend or partner with whom you can share all your secrets and problems. Hand-holding dreams have positive connotations and symbolize reconciliation and friendship, or a desire to feel love and protection, and God knows best.
